mapper.sql: id AS "id" , order_id AS "orderId" , store_code AS "storeCode" , order_code AS "orderCode" , user_code AS "userCode" , product_id AS "productId" , sku_id AS "skuId" , order_detail_type AS "orderDetailType" , sku_quantity AS "skuQuantity" , unit_quantity AS "unitQuantity" , discount AS "discount" , discount_quantity AS "discountQuantity" , unit_display_price AS "unitDisplayPrice" , unit_price AS "unitPrice" , order_detail_deduction AS "orderDetailDeduction" , pay_price AS "payPrice" , order_detail_memo AS "orderDetailMemo" , create_date AS "createDate" , update_date AS "updateDate" , delete_date AS "deleteDate"

sql.set: id = #{id}, order_id = #{orderId}, store_code = #{storeCode}, order_code = #{orderCode}, user_code = #{userCode}, product_id = #{productId}, sku_id = #{skuId}, order_detail_type = #{orderDetailType}, sku_quantity = #{skuQuantity}, unit_quantity = #{unitQuantity}, discount = #{discount}, discount_quantity = #{discountQuantity}, unit_display_price = #{unitDisplayPrice}, unit_price = #{unitPrice}, order_detail_deduction = #{orderDetailDeduction}, pay_price = #{payPrice}, order_detail_memo = #{orderDetailMemo}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_date = #{updateDate}, delete_date = #{deleteDate},

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_tra_order_detail ( id, order_id, store_code, order_code, user_code, product_id, sku_id, order_detail_type, sku_quantity, unit_quantity, discount, discount_quantity, unit_display_price, unit_price, order_detail_deduction, pay_price, order_detail_memo, create_date, update_date, delete_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderId}, #{storeCode}, #{orderCode}, #{userCode}, #{productId}, #{skuId}, #{orderDetailType}, #{skuQuantity}, #{unitQuantity}, #{discount}, #{discountQuantity}, #{unitDisplayPrice}, #{unitPrice}, #{orderDetailDeduction}, #{payPrice}, #{orderDetailMemo}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{deleteDate} )
